description: Number of elements in the free band (idempotent semigroup) on n generators.
comments: An idempotent semigroup satisfies the equation xx=x for any element x.
references: J. Howie, Fundamentals of Semigroup Theory, Oxford University Press 1995, p. 123.
links: Index entries for sequences related to semigroups
author: marcel_j(AT)hilbert.maths.utas.edu.au (Marcel Jackson)
